dr.evomodel.speciation
Class AlloppDiploidHistory

java.lang.Object
  dr.evomodel.speciation.AlloppDiploidHistory
All Implemented Interfaces:
SlidableTree
public class AlloppDiploidHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements SlidableTree

AlloppDiploidHistory represents part of the network before hybridizations. It is basically a tree with some tips representing diploid species at present time and others representing the points at which hybridization occurs.

Author:
Graham Jones Date: 13/03/2012
